owlSpeak.engine

Class ServletEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • owlSpeak.engine.ServletEngine

  • public class ServletEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    The object that contains the Core object and the VoiceDocument functions
    Author:
    Dan Denich;, Stefan Ultes <stefan.ultes@uni-ulm.de>

      • buildRequestPomdp

        public OwlDocument buildRequestPomdp(java.lang.String whereAmI,
                            java.lang.String user,
                            java.lang.String noInputCounter)
        One of the build functions that generate output in POMDP mode. One of the two main functions request and work that are used for the dialogue progress in a POMDP mode. Called only if DocType = 7. Return a document that is built according to the current active agenda and the current slot.
        Parameters:
        whereAmI - the netadress of the servlet
        user - the name of the user

      • buildRequest

        public OwlDocument buildRequest(java.lang.String whereAmI,
                       java.lang.String user,
                       java.lang.String noInputCounter)

      • buildRequest

        public OwlDocument buildRequest(java.lang.String whereAmI,
                       java.lang.String user,
                       java.lang.String noInputCounter,
                       UserAction userAct,
                       boolean pureRequest)
        Determines the next system action according to policy and generates an OwlDocument.

        Parameter pureRequest should be true if this method is called directly and not from another build method, e.g., buildWork. It controls whether requestMoves are executed.
        Parameters:
        whereAmI - the net address of the servlet
        user - the user name
        noInputCounter - counter which indicates the number of noinputs
        userAct - the last user action
        pureRequest - should be true if this method is called directly and not from another build method, e.g., buildWork. Controls
        Returns:
        a new OwlDocument representing the new system action

      • buildWorkOld

        public OwlDocument buildWorkOld(java.lang.String whereAmI,
                       java.lang.String agenda,
                       java.lang.String move,
                       java.lang.String speak,
                       java.lang.String user)
        one of the build functions that generate output. one of the two main functions request and work that are used for the dialogue progress writes the current state to the ontolgies
        Parameters:
        whereAmI - the netadress of the servlet
        agenda - the name of the agenda that should be processed
        move - the name of the move that is said by the user
        speak - the input of of the user as a string
        user - the name of the user

      • buildWorkPomdp

        public OwlDocument buildWorkPomdp(java.lang.String whereAmI,
                         java.lang.String agenda,
                         java.lang.String speak,
                         java.lang.String user,
                         java.lang.String[] resultList,
                         java.lang.String resultLen,
                         java.lang.String[] Confidences,
                         java.lang.String[] Speaklist)
        One of the build functions that generate output in POMDP mode. One of the two main functions request and work that are used for the dialogue progress in POMDP mode. Called only if DocType = 7. Write the current state to the ontolgies.
        Parameters:
        whereAmI - the netadress of the servlet
        agenda - the name of the agenda that should be processed
        user - the name of the user
        resultList - the N-best list of move that are said by the user
        resultLen - the length of the resultList
        Confidences - a list of confidence scores according to the resultList
        Speaklist - the input of of the user as a string array

      • buildWork

        public OwlDocument buildWork(java.lang.String whereAmI,
                    java.lang.String agenda,
                    java.lang.String user,
                    java.lang.String[] resultList,
                    java.lang.String resultLen,
                    java.lang.String[] confidences,
                    java.lang.String[] speaklist)
        One of the build functions that generate output in POMDP mode. One of the two main functions request and work that are used for the dialogue progress in POMDP mode. Called only if DocType = Settings.Usersetting.HIS_VXML_DOC. Processes the input moves and updates the partition distribution.
        Parameters:
        whereAmI - the netadress of the servlet
        agenda - the name of the agenda that should be processed
        user - the name of the user
        resultList - the N-best list of move that are said by the user
        resultLen - the length of the resultList
        confidences - a list of confidence scores according to the resultList
        speaklist - the input of of the user as a string array
        Returns:
        {link buildRequest(String, String, String, UserAction, boolean) or error document

      • buildWorkHIS

        public OwlDocument buildWorkHIS(java.lang.String whereAmI,
                       java.lang.String agenda,
                       java.lang.String speak,
                       java.lang.String user,
                       java.lang.String[] resultList,
                       java.lang.String resultLen,
                       java.lang.String[] confidences,
                       java.lang.String[] speaklist)
        One of the build functions that generate output in POMDP mode. One of the two main functions request and work that are used for the dialogue progress in POMDP mode. Called only if DocType = Settings.Usersetting.HIS_VXML_DOC. Processes the input moves and updates the partition distribution.
        Parameters:
        whereAmI - the netadress of the servlet
        agenda - the name of the agenda that should be processed
        user - the name of the user
        resultList - the N-best list of move that are said by the user
        resultLen - the length of the resultList
        confidences - a list of confidence scores according to the resultList
        speaklist - the input of of the user as a string array
        Returns:
        {link buildRequest(String, String, String, UserAction, boolean) or error document

      • buildSolveConflict

        public OwlDocument buildSolveConflict(java.lang.String whereAmI,
                             java.lang.String conflict,
                             java.lang.String user)
        one of the build functions that generate output. return a document with virtual moves, used for conflict resolution
        Parameters:
        whereAmI - the net address of the servlet
        user - the name of the user
        conflict - the input that caused the conflict

      • buildPluginRequest

        public OwlDocument buildPluginRequest(java.lang.String whereAmI,
                             java.lang.String utterance,
                             java.util.Vector<java.lang.String[]> grammar,
                             java.lang.String user)
        one of the build functions that generate output. return a document with virtual moves, used for conflict resolution
        Parameters:
        whereAmI - the net address of the servlet
        utterance - the strings the system should say
        grammar - Vector with String[] containing {"OntoName", "MoveName", "Grammar"}
        user - the name of the user

      • docType

        public OwlDocument docType(int docType,
                  int grammarType)

        docType - the Integer representing the type of view to be generated
        grammarType - the Integer representing the type of grammar to be generated. TODO remove IGrammar from constructor and method docType

        public IGrammar grammarType(int grammarType)

        Parameters:
